Oceania only has 14 countries. Therefore, choosing 20 or 30 countries is equivalent to \"All\".

• Country to flag: For each question, you are given a country. Find the flag for that country. 
• Flag to country: For each question, you are given a flag. Choose the country that has the flag. 
• Country to capital: For each question, you are given a country and four capitals. Find the correct capital. 
• Capital to country: For each question, you are given a capital city. Which country does it belong to? 
• Largest area: For each question, choose the country with the largest area. 
• Highest population: For each question, choose the most populated country.
Terrania is an engaging quiz app about countries around the world. Test your knowledge with quizzes about country names, flags, population and country area.
